original_text: But when he was strong, his heart was lifted up to his destruction: for he transgressed against the Lord his God, and went into the temple of the Lord to burn incense upon the altar of incense.
korean_text: 그가 강성하여지매 그의 마음이 교만하여 악을 행하여 그의 하나님 여호와께 범죄하되 곧 여호와의 성전에 들어가서 향단에 분향하려 한지라

sentences.original_text: his heart was lifted up to his destruction
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 마음은 스스로 높아져 멸망에 이르렀다

sentences.original_text: for he transgressed against the Lord his God
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 자기 하나님 여호와께 범죄하였기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: and went into the temple of the Lord
to burn incense upon the altar of incense
